data.label: Python Basics
data.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected.

data.label: Data Structures
data.description: Learn about arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and more.

data.label: Algorithms
data.description: Sorting, searching, recursion, and algorithmic thinking.

data.label: OOP & Advanced Topics
data.description: Object-oriented programming, decorators, iterators, and more.

data.label: Repo Hosting
data.description: GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and open source.

data.label: Testing
data.description: Unit testing, pytest, and test-driven development.
